visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts variwide chart with the title 'Stack labels in variwide chart'. The chart should have two data series, each with specific data points. The x-axis should be of type 'category'. The y-axis should have stack labels enabled. The chart should use custom colors for the series and have additional configurations such as stacking normal and a specific height for the container.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration sets up a variwide chart with a title 'Stack labels in variwide chart'. The x-axis is configured as a category type, and the y-axis has stack labels enabled to display the cumulative values of the stacked series. The chart includes two data series, each with specific data points and custom colors. The first series uses a green color (#008000), and the second series uses an orange color (#FFA500). The plot options specify that the series should be stacked normally. The chart is designed to be rendered within a container with a height of 400px, as specified in the CSS.
